name: PHAEDRA
description:
In the futuristic world of Albion, the Mighty King Arthurus Pendragon asked his royal scientist to create a program that would allow them to thwart the Council's offensives.

Merlin created PHAEDRA, "Camelot Light", a program with its own intelligence and its own knowledge. But which path will he choose? Will he follow the orders of his King and his creator? Will he help the Council? Or will they pursue their own goal away from this war?

In this game mixing platform, puzzle and story, choose your own Destiny!
